secondary_skills: TypeScript,Firebase Cloud Functions,Firestore Transactions,Firebase Admin SDK
resource_notes: Requires deep expertise in Firestore transactions and Firebase Auth custom claims to ensure atomicity and security.
alternative_approach: A mid-level developer could attempt this with heavy senior oversight, increasing review hours by 100%.
risk_factors: High risk of data inconsistency or security flaws if rollback logic is imperfect.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory pair programming session for implementation; exhaustive unit and integration tests for all failure paths.

resource_notes: Requires native configuration (iOS Info.plist, AndroidManifest.xml) and handling platform-specific permission nuances.
alternative_approach: None, this is a core requirement.
risk_factors: Inconsistent GPS performance across different device models. OS updates can break permission handling.
mitigation_strategy: Thorough manual testing on a range of physical iOS and Android devices.

task_name: Data: Implement Offline Check-in and Automatic Sync
resource_notes: Complexity lies in understanding Firestore's offline SDK behavior and ensuring data integrity upon reconnection.
alternative_approach: Could use a simpler local DB, but would lose Firestore's automatic sync capabilities, increasing complexity elsewhere.
risk_factors: Data loss if sync fails silently. OS background processing limits can prevent timely sync.
mitigation_strategy: Implement robust E2E testing for offline scenarios. Add in-app alerting for persistent sync failures (US-035).

task_name: Backend: Develop Scheduled Cloud Function for Sheets Export
secondary_skills: TypeScript,Firebase Cloud Functions,Google Sheets API,Cloud Scheduler
resource_notes: Requires expertise in handling third-party API auth, rate limits, and idempotent operations.
alternative_approach: Could use a third-party ETL service, but would add cost and another point of failure.
risk_factors: Breaking changes in Google Sheets API. Hitting API rate limits for large tenants. Auth token expiration.
mitigation_strategy: Implement comprehensive error handling, alerting, and a retry mechanism for failed records.
